body.bibl: Grypeou, Emmanouela. “Ephraem Graecus, ʻSermo In Adventum Domini᾽: A Contribution to the Study of the Transmission of Apocalyptic Motifs in Greek, Latin and Syriac Traditions in Late Antiquity.” In Graeco-Latina et Orientalia: Studia in Honorem Angeli Urbani Heptagenarii, edited by Samir Khalil Samir and Juan Pedro Monferrer-Sala, 165–79. Series Syro-Arabica 2. Cordoba: Cordoba Near Eastern Research Unit / Beirut: Centre de Documentation et de Recherches Arabes Chrétiennes, 2013.
